<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rallying Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6357) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to your Speed and make a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306). If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit gains [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) equal to your Charisma modifier. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.
name: Rallying Charge
